Released: 5 January 2026

## Highlights

- *New PG4K operator LTS Support:* PG4K operator v1.28.0 is now supported

## Supported versions

- Kubernetes: 1.34, 1.33, and 1.32
- PostgreSQL: 17, 16, 15, 14

  PostgreSQL 17.7 is the default image

- PGD Extension: v5.9
- PG4K: v1.28.0, v1.25.5

## Default Operand images

- PGD: `docker.enterprisedb.com/k8s/postgresql-pgd:17.7-pgd591-ubi9`
- PGD proxy: `docker.enterprisedb.com/k8s/edb-pgd-proxy:5.9.1-ubi9`

This release of EDB Postgres® AI for CloudNativePG™ Global Cluster includes the following:

## Features

<table class="table w-100"><thead><tr><th>Description</th><th width="10%">Addresses</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td><details><summary>Physical remote join discovery</summary><hr/><p>When performing a physical join, discovery can use the group service and will use the DSN
from the remote database catalog to perform pg_basebackup and the physical join.</p>
</details></td><td>#1659</td></tr>
<tr><td><details><summary>PGD group cleanup phases</summary><hr/><p>The pgdgroupcleanup reconciler now uses phases to represent progress.</p>
</details></td><td>#1617, #1643</td></tr>
</tbody></table>


## Security Fixes

<table class="table w-100"><thead><tr><th>Description</th><th width="10%">Addresses</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td>Updated operator base image to ubi-micro v9.7.</td><td>#1514</td></tr>
</tbody></table>


## Bug Fixes

<table class="table w-100"><thead><tr><th>Description</th><th width="10%">Addresses</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td>Fixed an issue that prevented operator reconciliation when PGD nodes were parted.</td><td>#1615</td></tr>
<tr><td>PGD4K now explicitly sets the image name when a `pgdgroup` uses the default image.</td><td>#1592</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
